item.title: Where to Put My Money
item.description: Invest only in things that you care about. Invest because you want to support the cause, not because it will bring you more money. Making more money is useful though, for you can increase your ability to do good and increase your ability to support good causes.

item.title: In which Area to Start a Company
item.description: sustainable architecture (build it faster, cheaper and sustainable) food production mars food production and planet terraforming How? MAKING IT CHEAPER AND BETTER THAN ANYONE ELSE

item.title: Road to 100k job
item.description: https://refactoring.guru tune my Github open source contribution own epic web site blog = 2nd brain epic presentation (3d tree in jungle as in Avatar, scrolling from bottom to up, roots = education, trunk and branches = time successive projects and experiences, well arranged) in English to read: Design Patterns

item.title: Why NOT to Eat Animals or Their Products?
item.description: they live in crowded ([[notes/Man’s Search for Meaning#^0de131|as inmates in concentration camps did]]), filthy conditions
